name: Minecraft: Java Edition
description: Minecraft is a sandbox game which allows player to build in a 3D procedurally generated world using a variety of different blocks. Other activies include exploration, combat and crafting.

name: Stardew Valley
description: Stardew Valley is a farming simulation rpg developed by Eric 'ConcernedApe' Barone.
platform: PC, PS4, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch, PSVita, Mobile (not released yet)
